title: "The Narrative and Mechanics Won't Stop Kissing!" - A Guide to Clerics with Emma Carlson
itunes:title: "The Narrative and Mechanics Won't Stop Kissing!" - A Guide to Clerics with Emma Carlson
description:
This week the Halflings are here with special guest Emma Carlson to preach the good word of one of the deepest and most powerful classes in the game! Listen to hear why the Cleric is so much more than just the designated healer! The power of faith compels you!

Go follow our friend Emma Carlson on Twitter @em_carlson and check out her show @BlackwaterDnd!

If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Want more 3BH in your life? You can now buy merchandise here! .

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord, or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
